short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens a user-specified webpages in popup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing FlashTabs by Bliink, the ultimate Chrome extension designed to enhance your web browsing efficiency and streamline your online workflow. With FlashTabs, you can configure up to five tabs for quick access to your most frequented websites, ensuring that your favorite pages are always just a click away. Whether it's news sites, social media, work tools, or anything in between, FlashTabs makes navigation seamless and effortless.

Key Features:

Customizable Quick Access Tabs: Easily configure up to five tabs with names and URLs for instant access to your essential websites.
Sleek Design: Enjoy a clean, user-friendly interface that complements your browsing experience without overwhelming it.
Adaptive and Responsive: Adjust the popup dimensions to suit your screen size and preference, ensuring optimal usability.
Website Compatibility Notice: Due to security policies, some websites may restrict loading within iframes. FlashTabs smartly notifies you of such instances, maintaining a smooth browsing experience.
Effortless Link Opening: Open links in new browser tabs with a simple Ctrl-click or right-click context menu, enhancing your navigation flexibility.
Streamlined Browsing at Your Fingertips:
FlashTabs by Bliink is more than just a tab manager; it's a productivity booster that caters to your unique browsing habits. Tailor your experience by choosing which tabs to display and adjusting the interface to meet your needs. Remember, your configurations are saved for future sessions, making your online journey as smooth as possible.

Whether you're a professional juggling multiple projects, a student researching various sources, or someone who likes keeping their favorite sites organized, FlashTabs by Bliink offers the perfect solution to enhance productivity and save time.

Easy Setup, Effortless Use:
Getting started is a breeze. Simply add FlashTabs to Chrome, set up your preferred tabs, and you're ready to elevate your browsing experience. Say goodbye to cluttered bookmarks and hello to efficient, one-click access to the content that matters most to you.

Download FlashTabs by Bliink today and transform the way you navigate the web!
